climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: 【Super Smooth cooling Fiber Surface Layer】The surface layer is made of upgraded cooling and smooth fiber material, which can quickly relieve heat and make you feel cooling. It also has better perspiration performance, which is very suitable for hot sleepers and is also a great gift. It's also environmentally friendly (OEKO-TEX certified) and breathable, maximizing air circulation for your comfort while you sleep.

【100% Waterproof】-The back of the mattress protector is high quality double-layer TPU (SGS certified) ,Protects against sweat, Bedwetting, Liquids and stains to prolong the life of mattress, Which is the best guard of your expensive mattress.
【Deep Pocket & 360° Elastic Band】- Our deep pocket mattress cover fits mattresses from 8 to 27 inches tall, with strong 360º elastic bands that provide full protection against shifting.
【3D Air Fabric & Noiseless 】- 3D air fabric is more breathable and softer and more comfortable than other materials, and it keeps your mattress fluffy and quiet.

【Care Guide And Customer Service】-Tested to be machine washable over 2000 times, tumble dry low, but please note do not iron, bleach or dry clean. We offer 30-day return/replace service and your 100% satisfaction. Contact our customer service through Amazon whenever you need.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why choose Cozymaker Waterproof Cooling Mattress Protector？ 100% Waterproof The mattress cover is made of top-grade TPU material, effectively prevent liquid spills, it’s the best choice for waterproof mattress protector. Deep Pocket The elastic around the mattress protector allows you to easily adjust its depth, making it a perfect fit for mattresses of all thicknesses. Breathable The filling on the surface of the COZYMAKER mattress protector is 3D Air Fabric, which has good breathability and will not make you feel stuffy. Smooth Our mattress protectors are ultra-soft, wrinkle-resistant and will provide you with great comfort.

Coolness The surface is made of PE material, which provides cooling when you sleep and relieves hotness. It is very suitable for hot sleepers. Soft&Noiseless The fabric of our mattress protector is soft, and there will be no noise when you change positions while sleeping, ensuring you a good sleep. Standard certification Our products have earned Standard Certification, are safe, odorless and won't endanger your health. Machine Wash Care is simple and can be machine washed directly, freeing your hands. Warm reminder: please refer to the washing precautions.
Previous page Next page 1 HEALTH & SAFETY 2 APPLICABLE SCENE 3 MACHINE WASHABLE 4 SIZE CHART

Which mattresses is this mattress cover suitable for? This cover is suitable for mattresses ranging in size from 8 to 21 inches. It is made tofit a variety of mattresses.including latex，spring and memory foam. Does it have a zipper? It doesn't have a zipper, it's elasticated elastic to enclose your expensive top-of-the-line mattress. What size does it come in? There are six sizes in total, which are: TWIN: 39 x 75" TWIN XL: 39×80" FULL: 54×75" QUEEN: 60×80" KING: 78×80" CAL king: 72×84" Is it machine washable? Yes, it can be machine washed, tumble dried at low temperature with sheets or other clothing or air dried. It can not be ironed，not dry cleanable. Do not use bleach. If you have any problem, pls contact to us through Amazon customer support.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I'm genuinely impressed with the Cozymaker King Size Waterproof Mattress Protector. Its deep fitted sheet compatibility is a game-changer, seamlessly fitting 8"-21" mattresses. The waterproof feature adds a practical touch, and the cooling bamboo material enhances comfort. The 3D Air Fabric makes it soft and breathable, ensuring a noiseless and comfortable sleep experience. In a crisp white color, it's both functional and aesthetically pleasing. A great investment for maintaining your mattress in top condition while enjoying a cool and peaceful night's sleep.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft , waterproof , deep pocket
reviews.reviewText: This has a nice fit. It is soft waterproof fabric. You wouldn’t know it was waterproof by touching it. It isn’t noisy like some. It’s a really nice quality mattress cover.The white color is pure. It has stitching throughout. It stretches nicely. I used it on a 14 in deep mattress.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I sleep really hot and this in conjunction with a good set of sheets has helped me get away from waking up soaking wet in the middle of the night.I love how much sturdier it is and that the fabric doesn’t give me the ick like most thinner mattress pads do.I LOVE LOVE LOVE that it is waterproof!!! We have a sweet lil beagle who for a while and now very rarely would pee on the bed when it was time to get in bed. She’d dig her lil comfy nest like dogs do and then she’d just…pee. It’s weird I don’t know, but you can imagine the stress and frustration at the race to rip the covers off the bed before it seeped through to the sheets and then beyond and then having to get them in the laundry and remake the bed - all while so tired you could cry (I did once. She did it 3 times in a row one night and I was beside myself I was so tired). Knowing that this is washable and will protect our mattress if (knock on wood) it ever happens again gives me such a peace of mind.Plus it’s miles more comfortable than your standard cheap mattress pad/cover.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful product and customer service!
reviews.reviewText: We had a problem with our initial order. Reached out to customer service and a replacement was shipped immediately.This mattress pad cover is by far the best cover I have ever had!! Large deep pockets that stay securely in place underneath the mattress. Also, it is quiet. Other waterproof covers can sometimes make a sound when moving about on them. Finally, it is so soft!!!I would highly recommend this mattress pad cover to anyone, whether you need a waterproof one or not.Thanks for your excellent customer service!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great price. Fits very well.I had a slight problem that customer service took care of quickly.Good product, great seller

reviews.reviewText: Fits our deep pocket mattress and very soft.

reviews.reviewText: Great fit on our king deep pocket mattress. Love that it doesn't make any crinkling noise as it is waterproof.
